column13:
Avera Regrowth Hair Oil (100 ml) Price: Rs.299

Avera Hair Re-growth Oil is effective in controlling hair loss. It fights against all bacteria and fungus that cause damages to your hair. It nourishes your hair from the root and reduces itching and dryness of scalp. The oil is non-sticky and conditions the scalp by improving blood circulation to the hair follicles. This hair regrowth oil strengthens each strand of your hair and leaves you with thick and healthy hair.
